about_the_game:
"——Welcome to the CangLan Era."

——Game Overview——

Welcome to Tenkei City, the last miracle city of humanity on this planet.

On the eve of the quadrennial Tenkei Festival, you return upon the commission of Lunar Corporation.Forge bonds, encounter love, or perhaps...break the facade of 'Eternity'.



Once, a glorious civilization thrived on this planet—until the exploration team brought the 『Anomaly』 back from space.

Over decades of coexistence with the 『Anomaly』, wars toppled nations, disasters engulfed the land, and the old era met its end.
After the war, the new era 『CangLan』 was established. Most survivors fled underground, leaving only one city above ground—Tenkei City, the last miracle of humanity.
……
In the 38th year of the CangLan Era, you return to Tenkei City for a task, right before the Tenkei Festival. The story of the "Final August" unfolds.





— RUNO —
"Morrigan, what I feel for her... is mostly guilt. The sorrow of this land becomes shackles that bind the newly born souls, and even now, her lifeboat has not yet set sail." -- 『Alkaid』
The 13th generation test subject in Tenkei City's underground experimental park, code-named 01, possesses the highest Star Source synchronization rate in history.
Bearing the name "RUNO," she is chosen as the spokesperson for the planet's will in the present world.
She looks innocent and innocent, but she's a smart girl who likes to set traps.


— LUNA —
「 In this city, there's no such thing as an ordinary daily life 」
The newly appointed student council president of Mochizuki High School, and the heiress to the Lunar Corporation in Tenkei City.
She is a core player of the popular console game "Genjin Impact" in Tenkei City.
With a lazy demeanor, she seems to harbor some unknown secrets behind her back.


— LILY —
「Coming to the forest at night is not a good choice 」
The 13th generation test subject in Tenkei City's underground experimental park, code-named 02.
A seemingly indifferent girl at first glance, she wears thorn-like 'accessories.'
Active in various districts of Tenkei City during the day, she wanders around the outskirts of the vast forest at night.


— CHUNXUAN —
「 It's a bit late to say this now, but... welcome back, Long Yu. 」
Long Yu's childhood friend, who passed the qualification exam in the same year as Long Yu.
They were classmates at Mochizuki High School, where she served as the class president.
Usually gentle, she teases Long Yu when in a good mood, and exerts an elder sister-like pressure when angry.
A pre-enrolled student of Tenkei City's top academy "TianFu."

《Tenkei * Love -The Last August Star-》 is an all-ages romance adventure game produced by RING (Yukikaze Sakura Production Team).

In the story, depending on the choices the player makes, the game takes different paths, leads to different developments, and reaches different endings.
The game will have about 20w of story text, original BGM soundtrack, main characters will include vertical painting, Q version, CG, full voice dubbing.


The story of this work is set in a fictional world view.
All characters featured in the game are adults.
detailed_description:
About Us

Latest news about 《Tenkei * Love -The Last August Star-》 Please follow us on:

▸ Official Bilibili: @RingStudio —

▸ Official Weibo: @TenkeiLove-RingStudio —

▸ Official QQ Chat: 290116525
Player QQ Chat: 141932215

name: Tenkei * Love -The Last August Star-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ 4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3+ 6000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: PCM (DirectSound support)

short_description: Welcome to Tenkei City, the last miracle city of humanity on this planet. On the eve of the quadrennial Tenkei Festival, you return upon the commission of Lunar Corporation, Forge bonds, encounter love, or perhaps...break the facade of 'Eternity'.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
